original_title: NBRO issues landslide warnings to three districts
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The National Building Research Organization has issued landslide warnings to the Badulla, Galle and Kalutara districts.

Accordingly, landslide warnings were issued to the Passara divisional secretariat in the Badulla district, Nagoda and Elpitiya divisional secretariats in the Galle district, and Walallavita, Agalawatta, and Bulathsinhala divisional secretariats in the Kalutara district.
